pull.title: Wake message handling thread when we receive a new block
pull.body:
This forces the message handling thread to make another full
iteration of SendMessages prior to going back to sleep, ensuring
we announce the new block to all peers before sleeping.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message:
Wake message handling thread when we receive a new block

This forces the message handling thread to make another full
iteration of SendMessages prior to going back to sleep, ensuring
we announce the new block to all peers before sleeping.

events.body: Should be up to a min(closest peer RTT, 100ms) decrease in block announce latency for non-HB-compact peers, especially if combined with #9535.

utACK 241d8938f4b5de1d2564ec7e064d8b0b8efd84a4. This was [suggested](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9441/#pullrequestreview-15542366) in #9441 and [expected](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9441/#issuecomment-270989192) post-merge.
